name: Incredible Stickman
description:
Incredible Stickman is the best puzzle game with Stick Man.

Your stick warrior will avenge his clan defeated by strange flying monsters. This is Stickman Platformer Puzzle with RPG and action elements.

▶ FEATURES
- simple controls (defeat the enemy with one punch)
- handsome stickman design
- realistic physics

Controls:

Left, right - arrows left, right

Jump - Space

menu interaction - cursor

IOS RELEASE!
